name: Alison Wong
title: Promotions
bio: Hi listeners, I'm Alison, a first year MD student and Promotions team member here at Raw Talk! I'm so excited to be returning this season and to create more exciting stories for you all. Working on the podcast has been a super rewarding experience, and I'm glad to be working alongside this amazing team again this year! Outside the podcast and academia, I'm an avid baker, and I love running and cycling too. Make sure to keep in touch by following us on all our socials!
